thread.title: Pick Up Select PS4 Bundles for $249 This Month
thread.title_full: Pick Up Select PS4 Bundles for $249 This Month

author: John Koller
title: Pick Up Select PS4 Bundles for $249 This Month
text:
Hey PlayStation Nation. It’s February, and you’re all probably well into your resolutions for the year. One of my resolutions is to play even more games — and to make sure that you and your friends get the chance to as well.
I’m happy to share that from February 12 through February 25, you can pick up the new, slimmer PS4 in either the Uncharted 4 PlayStation 4 bundle, or the Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare PS4 bundle for $249.99. Additionally, if you order the exclusive Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare PS4 bundle in Glacier White through Walmart.com, you’ll also receive this price promotion for $249.

Here are the options to choose from:
The Uncharted 4 PS4 bundle includes the slimmer PS4 model with a 500GB HDD, a DualShock 4 wireless controller, and the critically acclaimed Uncharted 4: A Thief’s End. The Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare PS4 bundle comes with the slimmer 500GB PS4 and a DualShock 4 wireless controller, along with the Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare Blu-ray disc, and a Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered download voucher. The Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare PS4 bundle in Glacier White comes with the slimmer Glacier White 500GB HDD PS4 and matching Glacier White DualShock 4 wireless controller, along with the Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare Blu-ray disc and a Call of Duty: Modern Warfare Remastered download voucher. The promotional price for this bundle is available exclusively at Walmart.com. With incredible titles like the recently released Resident Evil 7 biohazard from Capcom, Guerrilla Games’ upcoming open-world action RPG Horizon Zero Dawn dropping later this month, and EA’s Mass Effect: Andromeda coming soon, now’s the time to jump on a new PS4. Enjoy!
